requiredEquipmentExplanation: The video metadata, including the title, description, and tags, specifically mentions that this is a 'no equipment workout.' The description further emphasizes the calorie-burning nature of the walking program without any need for equipment. There is no direct mention or strong implication of equipment usage in the video content or from the user comments. Therefore, the workout appears to be exclusively bodyweight only, requiring no additional equipment.
